item.title: Report E-2025010016
item.description:
Report E-2025010016

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T18:25:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-11
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately one tenth (.1) of a gallon of material released from one (1) 1-gallon metal can due to improperly loaded freight that resulted in the pail being crushed. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel gathered the spent material and containerized it into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
